department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: History of Christian Thought: The Medieval West
course.description: The course will survey the main features of Christian theology from the 11th through the 15th centuries. We will focus on the particular genres, modes of argumentation, questions, and goals of theology as it emerges in multiple contexts within the medieval West.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 2629.
